backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder for backend canister logic.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregates feature-to-file mappings and metadata for implemented blog UI, markdown support, theme, and ergonomics.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for all major frontend components, features, and static assets.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads the main entry script.
frontend/public/posts/convolutional-neur: Markdown post introducing CNNs and outlining their architectural components.
frontend/public/posts/image-segmentation: Markdown post explaining semantic, instance, and panoptic segmentation along with segmentation architectures.
frontend/public/posts/introduction-to-co: Markdown post covering computer vision basics, image processing, and feature detection.
frontend/public/posts/manifest.json: Manifest listing blog post metadata including slugs, titles, dates, excerpts, tags, and filenames.
frontend/public/posts/object-detection-m: Markdown post describing object detection tasks, outputs, and major detector families.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for the post list and post detail pages wrapped in BlogLayout.
Displays a user-friendly error message when a requested post is missing.
frontend/src/components/layout/BlogHeade: Sticky header with blog title, tagline, and an illustration asset.
frontend/src/components/layout/BlogLayou: Page layout wrapping header, main content area, and footer with styling.
frontend/src/components/markdown/Markdow: Renders markdown securely by escaping HTML and applying custom parsing rules.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders a post preview card showing title, date, excerpt, tags, and a link to the full post.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostSearch: Provides a styled search input for filtering posts by text.
frontend/src/features/posts/posts.static: Fetches the post manifest and individual Markdown files from static endpoints.
Defines TypeScript types for post metadata, manifest, and full post content.
frontend/src/features/posts/usePosts.ts: React Query hooks for loading all posts and fetching Markdown content for a specific post.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, noting that no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color tokens and typography for the app, including markdown styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full post with title, date, tags, and rendered Markdown content.
frontend/src/pages/PostListPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of posts with loading and empty states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON describing the blog project's current state, including schema version, required images, existing features, and pending feature requests. It outlines a Markdown-based computer-vision blog with a paper-textured visual theme.
